page.title: 15MAIN ROAD IN NORTH KILWORTH
page.content: {STATION RD.} Station Rd. is the main Lutterworth to Market Harborough Rd.Both public houses and all three garages which sell petrol are to be found along it.There are also several places of employment on one short stretch of road.Chandler's Brush Factory,and Ball's the carriage and wagon renovators are at one end of the village,and C.Y.O.Seeds,Carryfast, Gandy's,Hucker Marine and a scaffolding firm at the Market Harborough end. The Post Office is found on the south side in between the two public houses. There are also a number of private houses,mainly victorian at the west end,but slightly more modern as one goes through the village. All the other roads in the village lie to the South of this road,the A427
